about_the_game:
Senzu is an enchanting Fantasy Farming-Space Simulation RPG! (Magic in Space! No technology)


On a personal journey, you carry the 'Hallowed Seeds' of your lost family's memory, seeking a sacred resting place in the mystical Verdant Region.
The Crethun, a dark guild from the south, has emerged and threatens to prevent you from finding a home in their relentless quest for an ancient power, fallen from a long-lost god.
Will you find peace in the home you are searching for, or will your heart lead you to explore the expanse of the Verdant Region?


Senzu Creatures

"The Drifting" phenomenon has significantly weakened the connection of magic to the Yodin. Only those who can bond with a Senzu possess the ability to Aetherweave. Find, care for, train, love, and build a relationship with each of these wonderful, mystical creatures. As the bond with your Senzu grows, so will your ability to wield this ancient power.

Your Own Home

Find your own garden among the stars and grow your own home! Farm your land and use it to care for your Senzu, because without them, you wont get very far!
Take the treasures you find in the Verdant Region and cultivate them here, making this place truly your own!

Discover And Explore

Guild of Aetherweaving
Since ‘The Drifting,’ the role of the Guild has changed significantly from its early days, when it was just a small group of odd men and women waving their limbs about. In the current era, it has become a respected name and a place you’ll want to visit if you need magical assistance with a problem.


The Dark Guild
Rumors have been floating around, that the Verdant Region has an infestation down south from a group who are searching for something…


Star Boats
Feeling brave? Explore shallow space in a “Navis” (a star boat). Need to travel across the void of deep space? No worries — you should be able to find someone to charter a “Cirunavis” (a starship). There are lots of isles in the Verdant Region for you to explore!


Wild Senzu
While exploring in the Verdant Region be on the lookout for wild Senzu! They’re quite timid creatures so good luck! If you do spot one, I wouldn’t suggest trying to catch it… If you have room for another Senzu you'll have to find a “Senzu Bloom” and hope you get a “Senzu Seed”!




Senzu is a game that I think about 24/7 and am incredibly passionate about.
I hope you enjoy the world of Senzu!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 3GB, AMD RX 470 4GB, Intel UHD graphics 630
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Senzu merges farming, creature nurturing, and RPG elements, where players discover, train, and form bonds with mystical Senzu creatures. This beautiful, watercolor-inspired game will takes you on an adventure through the Verdant Region of the Yodin universe.
